[[Category:Monsters]] {| style="background:#f5faff; border:1px solid #cedff2; width:auto; margin: 0px 5%; margin-bottom:1.25em; font-style:italic; text-align:left; color:#000; padding:1.5em 1em;" |- | | style="width: 100%;" | A muscular horned humanoid figure originating from some frigid hell. It swoops through the air on powerful wings, taking sadistic joy from harrying those who would try to flee its grasp. ---- “From the sad marine decanter I then drew the cork. Instanter
Out there jumped a little devil, blue in colour; and before
I could speak to the new comer (for I never was struck dumber),
Down upon my empty rummer, straight the little devil bore,
Right into my empty tumbler straight the little devil bore,
Squatted, grinned and nothing more.

There the little imp sat grinning at me while my head went spinning,
So that had I not sat down I should have fallen upon the floor;
‘Though thy looks be somewhat evil,’ said I ”tell me thou blue devil,
Wherefore holdest though thy revel in the glass that held before
Much the more agreeable spirit,—mizzle! leave me as before.“
Then the imp said ‘Never-more!’

Though I felt uncommon funky, still this answer put my monkey
Up, and at the small blue devil in an undertone I swore.
Then I said I must be dreaming, although broad awake I'm seeming;
Doubtless I shall have a screaming morning headache — what a bore:
Salmon I will eat no more.”
-J.T.S, “The Blue Imp”, _Melbourne Punch_. Sept. 4, 1856. |} [[Category:Templates]] ==Useful Info== '''Blue devils''' are weak [[fly]]ing [[tier-4 demon]]s. The polar opposite of [[red devil]]s, they are resistant to cold, but weak to fire. Blue devils have a swooping attack (range 4): this allows them to move past intervening creatures, land on the opposite side, and immediately perform a melee attack. They can often be found in [[Cocytus]] or in [[Ice cave]]s. ==Tips & Tricks== None needed, though when found in the Ice Cave, be on the lookout for powerful [[ice devil]]s and [[ice fiend]]s. ==History== *Blue devils were removed in [[0.18]]. Their swoop mechanic was moved to [[hellwing]]s. *Prior to [[0.13]], blue devils did not have a swoop attack. [[Category:Demon]]
